channel.title: [PI] My shop is messed up!
channel.description: I don't know why but I have a tokkul shop and it sells everything for x100 of it's actual price! Example: Items costs 2 tokkul, how much does it really cost? 200. Any Ideas?

item.title: [PI] My shop is messed up!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:5, topic:442824”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=545509.msg3998816#msg3998816 date=1337648801]

                if (Server.shopHandler.ShopBModifier[c.myShopId] == 1) {
                        TotPrice *= 1;
                        TotPrice *= 1;
                        if (Type == 1) {
                                TotPrice *= 1;
                        }
                } else if (Type == 1) {
                        TotPrice *= 1;
                }
                return TotPrice;

what

Anyways, since the item value is set in the items.cfg file, I would suggest looking there first, and making sure that the values are correct there.
[/quote]

in PI prices are loaded from prices.txt in your cfg folder[/quote]

I’ll remember that for the future.

However, am I the only one that was skullfucked by that block of code?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] My shop is messed up!
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:442824”] if (Server.shopHandler.ShopBModifier[c.myShopId] == 1) { TotPrice *= 1; TotPrice *= 1; if (Type == 1) { TotPrice *= 1; } } else if (Type == 1) { TotPrice *= 1; } return TotPrice;

what

Anyways, since the item value is set in the items.cfg file, I would suggest looking there first, and making sure that the values are correct there.[/quote]

in PI prices are loaded from prices.txt in your cfg folder

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] My shop is messed up!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

                if (Server.shopHandler.ShopBModifier[c.myShopId] == 1) {
                        TotPrice *= 1;
                        TotPrice *= 1;
                        if (Type == 1) {
                                TotPrice *= 1;
                        }
                } else if (Type == 1) {
                        TotPrice *= 1;
                }
                return TotPrice;

what

Anyways, since the item value is set in the items.cfg file, I would suggest looking there first, and making sure that the values are correct there.
